name: Capture invoice data in Pennylane using OCR
description:
Automate the extraction of key data from your supplier invoices from Pennylane with Koncile.
Connect to the Pennylane API via the Retrieve a supplier invoice endpoint
https://app.pennylane.com/api/external/v2/supplier_invoices/{id}
Automatically download PDF or XLSX files associated with invoices.
Send them to Koncile OCR using your private API key and a predefined document template.
Retrieve structured data (amounts, dates, suppliers, purchase orders, etc.) ready to be used in your accounting or automation workflows.
